title: ePortfolio Evidence Collection Strategies for Collaborative Learning in Distributed Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and experience in using digital tools
context.additional_context: Teaching competency enhancement course for pre-service or in-service teachers, involving collaborative learning in VR-based simulation environments and integrated management of distributed learning evidence across digital platforms

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect collaborative learning artifacts produced in simulation/VR environments into e-portfolios.
Learners can organize evidence collected from distributed learning environments (DLEs) in alignment with learning objectives.
Learners can conduct formative assessment based on portfolio evaluation through peer review and self-reflection activities.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
